attributes.action: WE the people want a General Election so you REALLY know what the people think
attributes.additional_details: Hold an election and LISTEN to what we actually want instead of what YOU think we want. If you would like our members of parliament to listen to us and let US decide the ways forward let us have a general election.
attributes.background: We the public have had enough of the in fighting between parliamentarians on all sides stating that they are doing so in OUR names and interests. If that is true we demand a general election as almost all of us are not impressed with our MP’s current behavior and actions
